# Marketing Boutique

> GTM Engineering and Generative Authority for AI-native B2B startups. We build revenue infrastructure, not campaigns.

## About

Marketing Boutique is a GTM Engineering agency specializing in AI-native B2B startups from Seed to Series B. We treat marketing as an engineering disciplineâ€”building automated data pipelines, CRM architecture, and programmatic prospecting systems that scale revenue without linear headcount growth.

Founded: 2024
Location: San Francisco, California
Website: https://marketing-boutique.com

## Core Capabilities

- **GTM Engineering**: Automated prospecting pipelines using Clay, n8n, Apollo, and HubSpot integration
- **Answer Engine Optimization (AEO)**: Structuring content for Featured Snippets and AI Overviews
- **Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)**: Entity authority and citation engineering for LLM visibility
- **Product Content Marketing**: Product-led content and programmatic SEO systems
- **Local Digital Transformation**: AI-ready local SEO for Bay Area SMBs

## Services

### For AI Startups (B2B)
- [GTM Engineering Hub](https://marketing-boutique.com/solutions/gtm-engineering/) - Full-stack revenue infrastructure
- [Data Enrichment Waterfalls](https://marketing-boutique.com/solutions/gtm-engineering/enrichment-waterfalls/) - Multi-source lead enrichment
- [CRM Architecture](https://marketing-boutique.com/solutions/gtm-engineering/crm-architecture/) - Revenue operations design
- [Outbound Infrastructure](https://marketing-boutique.com/solutions/gtm-engineering/outbound-infrastructure/) - Deliverability and automation
- [AEO & GEO](https://marketing-boutique.com/solutions/aeo-geo/) - AI search visibility optimization
- [Product Content Marketing](https://marketing-boutique.com/solutions/product-content-marketing/) - Citation-worthy content

### For Local SMBs
- [Local Transformation](https://marketing-boutique.com/solutions/local-transformation/) - Digital modernization for Bay Area businesses
- [Local SEO](https://marketing-boutique.com/solutions/local-transformation/local-seo/) - AI local pack optimization
- [Reputation Management](https://marketing-boutique.com/solutions/local-transformation/reputation-management/) - Review automation
- [GBP Optimization](https://marketing-boutique.com/solutions/local-transformation/gbp-optimization/) - Google Business Profile perfection
